evidence.claim: Nobis Health utilizes AWS services for their infrastructure, including AWS Lambda for serverless applications.
The company provides HIPAA-compliant data handling and adheres to HL7 standards for health data transmission.
Integration capabilities include RESTful APIs that facilitate connectivity between healthcare data systems.
Nobis Health mentions implementing FHIR APIs to facilitate interoperability in healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of sending/receiving X12 transactions found.
